page.title: 18SOCIAL CONCERNS.
page.content: ALTHOUGH WE HAVE QUITE A LOT OF FACTORIES IN OUR BLOCK THEY DO NOT SEEM TO MAKE MUCH POLLUTION AND SOME OF THEM ARE KEPT CLEAN WITH GRASSLAND AND TREES. LOOKING AROUND OUR AREA WHAT CONCERNS US MOST IS THE LITTER AND VANDALISM.THE LITTER IS NOT AS BAD AS SOME PLACES BUT THERE IS STILL A LOT ABOUT.VANDALS HAVE BROKEN SEVERAL PHONE BOXES AND THE WINDOWS ON BUS SHELTERS.IN SOME PLACES THERE IS SPRAY PAINT ON WALLS.ONE OF THE REASONS FOR THIS IS THAT THERE IS NOT A LOT TO DO AND CHILDREN GET BORED. SOME PARENTS ARE ALSO WORRIED ABOUT THE SCHOOLS BECAUSE THERE ALWAYS SEEMS TO BE RUMOURS THAT SOME WILL HAVE TO CLOSE BECAUSE THERE ARE NMOT ENOUGH CHILDREN TO FILL THEM.
